title: Slow cooker pheasant soup
ingredients: ['1 whole pheasant, jointed', '2 large onions, chopped', '4 carrots, peeled and sliced', '1 leek, sliced', '2 sticks celery, sliced', '1 bouquet garni', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 bottle white wine', '1.2L vegetable stock', 'chopped spring onions, to taste']
